Posts.Content: Dear Newbie, I was just like you I couldn't wait to get rid of the nasty stuff either.  I had my first fec yesterday was very nervous but it went fine.  I feel a little quasy and washed out this morning but taking the anti emetics. good luck Beara
Posts.Title: Hello, I'm a newbie

Posts.Content: I have been on tamoxifen for a few months now and I don't notice anything significany Of course I'm menopausal so many of the symptoms are second nature to me.  I'm 53 and I do get tired particularly in the afternoons. I also get hot flushes but I was getting them anyway.
Posts.Title: has anyone had any possive experiences with Tamoxifen????? Am due...
